summary:
I am a self-taught full stack developer who can quickly adapt to new circumstances. With a multidisciplinary skill set acquired over 15+ years in various domains, I make fast and solid web applications to solve problems while maintaining deadlines and budgets.
I am looking for new challenges and opportunities for growth and learning.

education.institution: Moy Yat Ving Tsun Martial Intelligence
Moy Yat Ving Tsun Martial Intelligence

descriptions: Full Stack developer working with Microsoft technologies (C#, WCF, WSSF, Nhibernate) on the back-end and Angular/Javascript/Xslt on the front-end. Also Working as tech leader and solutions architect using agile methodologies (Scrum, TDD, XP etc) for B&T (one of the greatest money exchange broker here in Brazil).
Maintaining and evolving old monoliths, dividing then over microservices communicating through Sql/Azure ServiceBroker in order to escalate from dozens to thousands of requests per minute.

Creating APIs for customers, integrations with different institutions like Bacen (Brazil's Central Bank), Receita Federal (Brazil's Federal Reserve), Brasil Pré-Pagos (Prepaid multi-currency Card), integrations for payments and receiving in Brazil from electronic transfers (TED) and payments to abroad like Swift, Moneygram and cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin/Ripple).

Automating deployments with Azure Devops and management activities with Microsoft Bot Framework. Creating tooling to speed up development for the team with visual studio extensions and to maintain some older applications (ActiveWriter).

experience.description: Senior consultant and developer in Microsoft BizTalk, SharePoint, SQL Server, ASP.NET working directly to customers from Rio de Janeiro (Light and L'Oreal) performing technical management, gathering requirements, application development and SAP integrations maintenance (XI and PI modules).

Maintenance of CRM System / ERP of the OI Tsunami project (SIA) and EPM (Sharepoint and Microsoft Project) with C# programming (Asp.Net and Desktop) using CCF, SQL Server and WCF; Systems optimizations and database management with Oracle and MS SQL Server. Also gathering requirements, negotiating deadlines, planning projects directly with the customers.

Programming in several languages (C#, VB, PHP, Javascript, ASP and even ActionScript) for Web and Desktop, database management (SQL SERVER, MYSQL and Oracle). Also working as a Project Manager and Team Leader creating functional and technical specification for two teams between Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo. Our principal clients were Aliança do Brasil (Insurance company of Banco do Brasil), Cultura Inglesa (English School) and Thomson Edu.

Web Developer working with PHP and ASP classic. Developing and maintaining the Apligraf´s CRM/ERP for StockMarket. For Digipix, We developed their photographic revelation service for companies (It received the Award of best solution by the Exame Magazine in 2005).

projects.name: Elug |> RJ
projects.technologies: Elixir, Phoenix Framework, OTP, Web RTC
projects.description: For those who do not bother with dynamic languages, Elixir is an invite to 'fall in love'. Built over the powerful OTP from Erlang, I believe that every programmers should look for the ideas behind it. I have joined as an organizer in 2016 and made two great events: the fourth, where we built a real-time Audio and Video chat over WebRTC; and the sixth, where we built a multiplayer starship game. I was planning to revamp it in 2020 but the pandemic delayed it to 2021.

projects.name: Jarvis
projects.technologies: Microsoft Bot Framework, NodeJs, Typescript, MS Sql Server, LUIS (Language Understanding Service)
descriptions: At White Fox, we support clients over chat applications, and we have an in house software for billing and planning. It was a natural step to implement a virtual assistant to help us integrate both. Jarvis was a humorous and grumpy Skype chat application wrote in typescript using Microsoft Bot Framework and the Language Understanding Service (to translate users input into intents and actions).
His capabilities included search for tasks, projects, registering billing, check team velocity and common repetitive tasks like generate codes and valid documents (CPF/CEPs, CNPJs...).

With new versions of Bot Framework, We create a new assistant called Lana on Microsoft Teams with most of Jarvis capabilities; we are planning to integrate her with Azure Devops (for CI/CD) and a service desk system.

projects.name: Grammar, Game Gourmet
projects.technologies: Ruby on rails, Elixir, AngularJs, Bootstrap, PostgreSql
projects.description: Grammar was a translation and extension system for markdown. Grifo Editoral had a huge amount of text that they develop on their internal wiki (redmine) and they wanted to direct publish it in a modern and more delightful format. Grammar (an Elixir orchestrator) used a microservice to translate the RedCloth markdown (from Redmine) to a more generic implementation that later it translates to a static page (Game Gourmet).

projects.name: .TV
projects.technologies: Ruby on Rails, AngularJs, Bootstrap, PostgreSql
projects.description: Web channel system. It used a Ruby on Rails application to upload, orchestrate, and encode videos in different formats for the web. The idea was to explore specific niches while granting fully control of content and audience. By the time they started YouTube was not lucrative and It was before his acquisition by google. They discontinued their principal project (Psicologica.TV - a psychology channel), after the YouTube/Facebook expansion. However, Yehudim.TV (a Jewish channel) still working and they sold ITVision.TV (an IT corporate channel – that now has a more modern version).
